?

How to play

Commands: move, draw, undo, restart.

move: moves cards from one block to another.

(E.g. "move t1 t2" will move a card from T1 to T2,

"move t1 t2 2" will move the 2 cards from T1 to T2.)

draw: draws a card from the waste pile(W1).

undo: reverses your last command.

restart: restarts the game.
